title: PacknWood Compostable Paper Soup Cup, 12 oz. (Case of 500)
features: MADE FROM PAPER - These soup containers are made out of recyclable kraft paper, and they are compostable and biodegradable. They are also grease-resistant and microwave- and freezer-safe.

GRAB AND GO - The kraft paper soup bowl is perfect for people on-the-go. They are an nature friendly solution for ramen, soup, ice cream, and more. The optional lid makes easily transforms the cup into a portable travel cup (sold separately: White Recyclable Plastic Lids, item 210LPLAS32).

PERSONAL OR BUSINESS - These cups can be used in the home for sustainable practices or they can be purchased for business use. The brown rippled kraft paper design is easily customizable with business logo stickers.
CASE OF 500 - Each case comes with five hundred individual cups. The dimensions of each cup are 2.5" in height by 4.4" wide and each cup has a 12-ounce capacity.

ECO FRIENDLY SOLUTIONS - Through inspiration, design, and nature friendly solutions, PacknWood creates value using natural, organic, and recyclable materials. Some of the natural resources we use include paper, bamboo, recycled and recyclable plastic, and more. Our smooth and elegant finished products make the food you serve more enticing, all while preserving the environment.
description: About the Compostable Paper Soup Cup - 210PLAS12

Made from all-natural 100% recyclable grease-resistant paper, these soup cups are a perfect solution for sustainable dining. They are microwavable and freezer safe. The kraft paper soup bowl is perfect for people on-the-go. They are an eco-friendly solution for ramen, soup, ice cream, and more. The optional lid easily transforms the cup into a portable travel cup (sold separately: White Recyclable Plastic Lids, item (210LPLAS32). Each case comes with five hundred individual cups. PacknWood is the American brand of a family-owned, well-established French manufacturer specializing in designing and manufacturing elegant disposable food packaging. For over 35 years, PacknWood has made it their goal to design fashionable, functional, and environmentally sustainable tableware that adds a special touch to your culinary presentation â€“ something we believe your customers will notice and appreciate. PacknWood offers the largest selection of plates, skewers, mini dishes, bakeware, and tableware, which are made from the most unique and natural materials: Bamboo, Wood, Palm Leaf, Sugarcane, and Cornstarch - all with a French touch to the design and presentation. The idea is simple: we create value using natural, organic, and recyclable materials. Our smooth and elegant finished products make the food you serve more enticing while preserving the environment.
